snippet: In the suit the man, Muhammad A. Salah, says, in essence, that it is impossible for him to lead a normal life without seeking approval from the government.
abstract: Muhammad A Salah of Bridgewater, Illinois, files a lawsuit in federal court seeking to lift restrictions placed on him by the Department of Treasury when it deemed him a specially designated terrorist in 1995.
lead_paragraph: In the suit the man, Muhammad A. Salah, says, in essence, that it is impossible for him to lead a normal life without seeking approval from the government.

headline.main: Illinois: Man Sues Over Terrorist Status
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Man Sues Over Terrorist Status
